title.rendered: Web Development Apprenticeship at BetaNXT, Bangalore [1 Year; Angular; DevOps; Node.js; SDLC; Batch 2023/2024]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Web Development Apprenticeship at BetaNXT, Bangalore. Check the details below!

About BetaNXT

BetaNXT is at the forefront of advancing connected wealth management infrastructure solutions, utilizing real-time data capabilities to enhance the wealth advisor experience. By combining deep industry expertise with the strengths of its established businesses—Beta, Maxit, and Mediant—BetaNXT focuses on addressing the most complex integration challenges faced by its customers. Their flexible, efficient, and connected solutions are designed to evolve with clients’ changing needs.

With a comprehensive approach, BetaNXT helps reduce enterprise costs, streamline operational processes, boost advisor productivity, and improve the investor experience. Wealth management firms leveraging BetaNXT’s solutions are transforming their platforms into strategic assets that drive enterprise growth and scalability.

Additionally, BetaNXT is committed to its people. Recognizing that their success is a collective effort, the company prioritizes creating opportunities for employees to learn, grow, and thrive.

Apprenticeship Details

BETA is a comprehensive self-clearing securities processing solution designed specifically for wealth management firms. Drawing on years of expert knowledge and practical experience, BETA provides essential back-office controls such as corporate action management, middle-office exception management, and front-office tools for account management and trading, all aimed at supporting advisors in their daily operations.

Currently, BETA is seeking a motivated and enthusiastic Apprenticeship Trainee to join their team. This entry-level position offers recent graduates the opportunity to gain valuable experience in corporate best practices and principles. The role provides hands-on learning in coding, quality delivery, and exposure to technologies such as AWS, Angular TypeScript, Node.js, CI/CD, and DevOps.

About Team

Reporting to the Senior Manager, Technology Development, you will be part of the development/DevOps team, assisting developers.

Responsibilities

  • Assist with daily operations and tasks for developers.
  • Participate in training sessions and workshops to enhance technical and professional skills that’s required to step in corporate world.
  • Collaborate with team members on various projects and assignments.
  • Maintain accurate records and documentation of work performed.
  • Always follow security and safety protocols and company policies.
  • Provide support to Developers and DevOps.

Required Skill Sets

  • AWS: Practical experience with Amazon Web Services.
  • Angular TypeScript: Hands-on training in building dynamic web applications using Angular and TypeScript.
  • Node.js: Real-world server-side programming with Node.js.
  • SDLC: Practical understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle in an enterprise environment.
  • CI/CD: Implementing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment practices.
  • devOps: Applying DevOps principles and practices to streamline development and operations.

Key Details of the Opportunity

  • Position: Apprentice.
  • Eligibility: Graduates of the 2023 / 2024 batch.
  • Location: Bangalore, Karnataka (5 days office).
  • Start Date: Immediate.
  • Duration: 1 year, depending on program.
  • Career Path: Potential for full-time employment based on performance.

How to Apply?

Interested and eligible candidates can directly apply through this link.

Location

Bangalore, Karnataka.
